title: (x) Wide black sans "Freitag" black box logo - Antique Olive Nord {Marc O}
content:
What is the name of the typeface Freitag, the makers of the funky recyclable bags, use for their “black box logo”?

[http://www.freitag.ch/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164151/http:/www.freitag.ch/ "http://www.freitag.ch/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [freitag\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164151/http:/typophile.com/files/freitag_logo.gif) | 1.5 KB |

 [‹ Looking for decorative Cyrillic fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164151/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47789 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Dent'n Scratch logo - Serpentine {Adam Jury} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164151/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47782 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Janmansilver

comments.content:
Based on Antique Olive Nord, I’d say:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/antique-olive/nord-d-regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821164151/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/antique-olive/nord-d-regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/antique-olive/nord-d-regular/")
